channel.title: CVE Feed for w8tcha -- CKEditor-WordCount-Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for w8tcha -- CKEditor-WordCount-Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-37905|2023-09-15T18:24:18.068Z -- w8tcha -- ckeditor-wordcount-plugin
item.description: ckeditor-wordcount-plugin is an open source WordCount Plugin for CKEditor. It has been discovered that the `ckeditor-wordcount-plugin` plugin for CKEditor4 is susceptible to cross-site scripting when switching to the source code mode. This issue has been addressed in version 1.17.12 of the `ckeditor-wordcount-plugin` plugin and users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.
